categoriesExplanation:
The workout is classified under 'Pilates' with a high score of 0.8 because the title ('15 MIN FULL BODY PILATES HIIT') and the description ('Pilates HIIT Workout with weights') directly reference Pilates as a key component. The use of the term 'Pilates HIIT' in the tags and description further supports this. The content on the channel is typically focused on Pilates, as it's owned by a certified Pilates instructor, Nicole.

The 'HIIT' category is assigned a score of 0.7 due to the repeated mention of HIIT (High-Intensity Interval Training) in the title, tags ('hiit workout', 'pilates hiit'), and description, indicating that the workout includes elements of high intensity typical of HIIT sessions.

'Weight workout' is included with a score of 0.6, as the description mentions using weights (although optional - 'if you don't have weights, you can still do the workout without them'), and the tags explicitly reference weights ('hiit workout with weights', 'pilates with weights'). This indicates that weights play a significant, albeit potentially minor, role in the workout.

Comments and channel information further confirm the Pilates focus of the workout, with several mentions of Pilates and implied intensity ('worked up a sweat'). The presence of weights and the HIIT structure differentiate it from a traditional Pilates session.
